title: 'S.W.A.T.' Star Shemar Moore & Girlfriend Jesiree Dizon Split After Nearly 5 Years - IMDb
text:
'S.W.A.T.' Star Shemar Moore & Girlfriend Jesiree Dizon Split After Nearly 5 Years
Shemar Mooreand
Jesiree Dizonare no longer together.
The 54-year-old S.W.A.T. star and the 41-year-old model have split up after almost five years together, according to TMZ.
They are said to have split “recently” and will remain friends and co-parents to their daughter Frankie Melelina Kapule Moore, who was born in early 2023.
Keep reading to find out more…
Shemar and Jesiree reportedly first got together in 2008 but split up as he was not ready to settle down. They then reconnected in 2020 and made their relationship public in 2023.
Back in November 2024, Shemar opened up about the possibility of marriage and shared his commitment to Jesiree.
“I didn’t have a good role model of marriage in my life. Not my mother, not my father. Nobody close to me,” he told People. “I struggle with ‘Who made that rule?’ I asked my mother one time. I’m like,...
- 1/31/2025
- by Just Jared
